*Deck items have been removed. For info regarding 'decks' still in the game, see [Cards](/Cards "Cards").*

|   |                                                                                                                                       |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A deck of powerful magical cards painted in the ichor of demons. They may have any number of helpful or dangerous effects when drawn. |

## Contents

- [1 Overview](#Overview)

  - [1.1 Power level](#Power_level)
  - [1.2 Composition of decks](#Composition_of_decks)

- [2 History](#History)

- [3 See also](#See_also)

## Overview

Decks are magical devices granted by [Nemelex Xobeh](/Nemelex_Xobeh "Nemelex Xobeh") which are used by e**V**oking them, similar to [wands](/Wand "Wand"). This draws a random [card](/Cards "Cards") from the deck to produce a certain effect. Each deck comes with 4-13 cards. Their power is governed by [Invocations](/Invocations "Invocations") skill and piety, not [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations").

### Power level

Decks can be either plain, ornate or legendary. Ornate and legendary decks get bonuses to card power.

| Plain                                                | Ornate                                                     | Legendary                                                  |
| ---------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| [![Deck.png](/images/8/85/Deck.png)](/File:Deck.png) | [![Deck 2.png](/images/5/50/Deck_2.png)](/File:Deck_2.png) | [![Deck 3.png](/images/d/d7/Deck_3.png)](/File:Deck_3.png) |

### Composition of decks

Decks of destruction, summoning and escape are composed of 6 different types of card which are randomly placed throughout the deck. The player will only draw from the deck of punishment if they try to deal four on a deck with less than four cards remaining, or when suffering from Nemelex's wrath.

| Deck  | [Destruction](/Deck_of_destruction "Deck of destruction")                                                                                                                                                                                            | [Escape](/Deck_of_escape "Deck of escape")                                                                                                                                                                                           | [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning")                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | [Punishment](/Deck_of_punishment "Deck of punishment")                                                                                                                                        |
| ----- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Cards | [Degeneration](/Degeneration_card "Degeneration card") [the Orb](/Orb_card "Orb card") [Pain](/Pain_card "Pain card") [the Storm](/Storm_card "Storm card") [Vitriol](/Vitriol_card "Vitriol card") [Wild Magic](/Wild_Magic_card "Wild Magic card") | [the Cloud](/Cloud_card "Cloud card") [the Elixir](/Elixir_card "Elixir card") [Exile](/Exile_card "Exile card") [the Shaft](/Shaft_card "Shaft card") [the Tomb](/Tomb_card "Tomb card") [Velocity](/Velocity_card "Velocity card") | [the Dance](/Dance_card "Dance card") [the Elements](/Elements_card "Elements card") [Foxfire](/Foxfire_card "Foxfire card") [the Illusion](/Illusion_card "Illusion card") [the Pentagram](/Pentagram_card "Pentagram card") [the Rangers](/Rangers_card "Rangers card") | [Famine](/Famine_card "Famine card") [the Swine](/Swine_card "Swine card") [Torment](/Torment_card "Torment card") [the Wraith](/Wraith_card "Wraith card") [Wrath](/Wrath_card "Wrath card") |

## History

- Prior to [0.23](/0.23 "0.23"), decks existed as items instead of being available via [Nemelex Xobeh](/Nemelex_Xobeh "Nemelex Xobeh")'s [abilities](/Ability "Ability").

- In [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), decks were greatly simplified. Prior to this version:

  - Decks could randomly be found on the floor, instead of being Nemelex only.

  - A [scroll of identify](/Scroll_of_identify "Scroll of identify") could be used to reveal both the deck type and the current top card.

  - Many decks were removed.

    - **Archetype Decks** were a list of cards that weren't used by the player, but were used to compose physical decks. They included the deck of [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle"), [Destruction](/Deck_of_destruction "Deck of destruction"), [Emergency](/Deck_of_emergency "Deck of emergency"), [Oddities](/Deck_of_oddities "Deck of oddities"), [Punishment](/Deck_of_punishment "Deck of punishment"), [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning"), [Transport](/Deck_of_transport "Deck of transport"), and [Wonders](/Deck_of_wonders "Deck of wonders"). All concept of archetype decks were removed (the 4 post-0.19 decks all had archetypes, but they also had a corresponding physical deck too).
    - **Physical Decks** were the decks you actually got. They used either one archetype deck ("pure" decks), or a mix of archetypes. Removed physical decks include the deck of [Changes](/Deck_of_changes "Deck of changes"), [Defence](/Deck_of_defence "Deck of defence"), [Oddities](/Deck_of_oddities "Deck of oddities"), [War](/Deck_of_war "Deck of war"), and [Wonders](/Deck_of_wonders "Deck of wonders").

  - There were also many more cards that existed. The full list of removed cards can be found on the [Cards](/Cards "Cards") page.

- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), players had to **w**ield the deck that they wished to draw from.
